summary: A lore-friendly, Radiant Story enabled dungeon smack-dab in the middle of Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
Just a lore-friendly, radiant story enabled dungeon that focuses on atmosphere, realism, and a bit of difficulty.  This dungeon is also leveled, so you can enter it at any level!  There are two pieces of lore, of the back-story of the dungeon, in it, two journals, one in a tent, one in a bandit chieftain\'s recently deceased body.
It will be dark in here, it is VERY recommended that you bring a torch or something that generates light or night vision.
You may edit this mod as you wish, but if there is something wrong with it please tell me about it so I may fix it and save you the trouble. :)

This is my first mod, enjoy!  Constructive criticism is welcome in the comments!
author: Ayegor
